CreateSitesWizard.IntroductionTitle: Welcome to the availability site creation wizard
CreateSitesWizard.IntroductionContent:
This Wizard will guide you through the creation of a new availability site
Click next button to continue
CreateSitesWizard.NameCaption: Assign the name and description for the new availability site
CreateSitesWizard.SummaryCaption: Check the new site information before creation
CreateSitesWizard.OnFinishSuccess: A new site was created successfully

Errors.NameFormat: Name field must contain only letters
Errors.NameStoreError: An error ocurred while storing the new site

OvmWidget.OvmNotFound: OVM Manager for this site is not set

CreateOvmWizard.IntroductionTitle: Welcome to the OVM Manager creation wizard
CreateOvmWizard.IntroductionContent:
This Wizard will guide you through the connection to OVM Manager in site {siteName}
Click next button to continue
CreateOvmWizard.AccessDataCaption: Set the connection data for the OVM Manager in site {siteName}
CreateOvmWizard.SummaryCaption: Check the new OVM Manager information before creation

Errors.HostnameFormat: Hostname field must contain only letters, numbers, dots and hyphens
Errors.HostnameExists: OVM Manager {hostname} linked to another site ({other.SiteName})
Errors.UsernameFormat: Username field must contain only letters, numbers, dots and hyphens
Errors.PortFormat: Port field must contain only numbers (1 - 65535)
Errors.OvmStoreError: An error ocurred while storing the new OVM Manager
